title: Fundamentals of IoT Network Performance Analysis Based on TWR-NOMA

context.prior_knowledge: Wireless communication theory basics, IoT system overview, and foundational statistics
context.additional_context: Practical training program for technical managers within organizations.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core components and operational principles of the TWR-NOMA system model
Learners can apply mathematical models to analyze error probability and transmission rates for NOMA users
Learners can utilize power allocation and time-switching optimization strategies in system performance evaluations
Learners understand fundamental concepts of deep learning-based real-time network prediction techniques
Learners can analyze the impact of co-channel interference on IoT network performance
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
